name: Roll & Fly
description:
Resource manager roguelike game, invest your rolls and improve your plane to reach the goal!

Each turn is divided in 4 parts:

1- Roll the dice! The result will be this turn's action points

2- Spend action points on improving your plane, buying fuel or repairing the plane. You can even buy another roll!

3- Select your next destination.

4- Fly away!

Each map is harder than the last - complete 3 routes to win!
